alert.note: Alert for Muskegon (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 26 at 12:08PM EDT until July 26 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of west central Michigan, including the following county, Muskegon. * WHEN...Until 615 PM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1208 PM EDT, Radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Muskegon, Muskegon Heights, Roosevelt Park, North Muskegon, Lakewood Club, Norton Shores, Dalton, Muskegon SP, Muskegon County Airport, Cloverville, Twin Lake, Wolf Lake and Duck Lake SP. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
